verses.text: Forasmuch then \w as|strong="G3767"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* hath \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w* in the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w arm|strong="G3695"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G5210"\w* \w likewise|strong="G2532"\w* with the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w mind|strong="G1771"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he that hath \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* hath \w ceased|strong="G3973"\w* from \w sin|strong="G0266"\w*;

\w That|strong="G1519"\w* \w he|strong="G0980"\w* no \w longer|strong="G3371"\w* should \w live|strong="G0980"\w* the \w rest|strong="G1954"\w* \w of|strong="G5550"\w* \add his\add* \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* to the \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w* of \w men|strong="G0444"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* to the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w time|strong="G5550"\w* \w past|strong="G3928"\w* \w of|strong="G0979"\w* \add our\add* \w life|strong="G0979"\w* may \w suffice|strong="G0713"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* to have \w wrought|strong="G2716"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*, when we \w walked|strong="G4198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w lasciviousness|strong="G0766"\w*, \w lusts|strong="G1939"\w*, excess of \w wine|strong="G3632"\w*, \w revellings|strong="G2970"\w*, \w banquetings|strong="G4224"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w abominable|strong="G0111"\w* \w idolatries|strong="G1495"\w*:

\w Wherein|strong="G1722"\w* they think it \w strange|strong="G3579"\w* that \w ye|strong="G5216"\w* \w run|strong="G4936"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w with|strong="G1519"\w* \add them\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w excess|strong="G0401"\w* of \w riot|strong="G0810"\w*, speaking evil \w of|strong="G0987"\w* \add you\add*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* shall \w give|strong="G0591"\w* \w account|strong="G3056"\w* to him that \w is|strong="G2192"\w* \w ready|strong="G2093"\w* to \w judge|strong="G2919"\w* the \w quick|strong="G2198"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* this \w cause|strong="G5124"\w* was the gospel \w preached|strong="G2097"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to them that are \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* they might be \w judged|strong="G2919"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w* in the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w live|strong="G2198"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* in the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* of all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* is at \w hand|strong="G1448"\w*: be \w ye|strong="G4993"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w sober|strong="G4993"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w watch|strong="G3525"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w prayer|strong="G4335"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w above|strong="G4253"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w fervent|strong="G1618"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G1438"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w charity|strong="G0026"\w* shall \w cover|strong="G2572"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*.
Use \w hospitality|strong="G5382"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w without|strong="G0427"\w* \w grudging|strong="G1112"\w*.

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* hath \w received|strong="G2983"\w* the \w gift|strong="G5486"\w*, \add even so\add* \w minister|strong="G1247"\w* the \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w stewards|strong="G3623"\w* of the \w manifold|strong="G4164"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w*, \add let him speak\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* the \w oracles|strong="G3051"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*; \w if|strong="G1487"\w* any \w man|strong="G5100"\w* \w minister|strong="G1247"\w*, \add let him do it\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w ability|strong="G2479"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w giveth|strong="G5524"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* may be \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, to \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w be|strong="G2076"\w* \w praise|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w dominion|strong="G2904"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w Beloved|strong="G0027"\w*, think \w it|strong="G3579"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w strange|strong="G3579"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1722"\w* the fiery \w trial|strong="G4451"\w* which \w is|strong="G1096"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w try|strong="G3986"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, as \w though|strong="G5613"\w* some strange \w thing|strong="G3581"\w* \w happened|strong="G4819"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, inasmuch \w as|strong="G2526"\w* ye are \w partakers|strong="G2841"\w* of \w Christ’s|strong="G5547"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w*, \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* shall be \w revealed|strong="G0602"\w*, ye may be \w glad|strong="G5463"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* with exceeding \w joy|strong="G0021"\w*.

\w If|strong="G1487"\w* ye be \w reproached|strong="G3679"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w happy|strong="G3107"\w* \add are ye\add*; \w for|strong="G3754"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w resteth|strong="G0373"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*: \w on|strong="G2596"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w part|strong="G2596"\w* he is evil spoken \w of|strong="G0987"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w on|strong="G2596"\w* \w your|strong="G5209"\w* \w part|strong="G2596"\w* he is \w glorified|strong="G1392"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1063"\w* \w let|strong="G3958"\w* \w none|strong="G3361"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w murderer|strong="G5406"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \add as\add* a \w thief|strong="G2812"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \add as\add* an \w evildoer|strong="G2555"\w*, \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a busybody in other \w men’s matters|strong="G0244"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \add any man suffer\add* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w Christian|strong="G5546"\w*, let \w him|strong="G0153"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w ashamed|strong="G0153"\w*; \w but|strong="G1161"\w* let him \w glorify|strong="G1392"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w this|strong="G5129"\w* \w behalf|strong="G3313"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* the \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \add is come\add* that \w judgment|strong="G2917"\w* must \w begin|strong="G0756"\w* \w at|strong="G0575"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \add it\add* \w first|strong="G4412"\w* \add begin\add* \w at|strong="G0575"\w* \w us|strong="G2257"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall the \w end|strong="G5056"\w* \add be\add* of them that obey \w not|strong="G0544"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* the \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w* \w scarcely|strong="G3433"\w* be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*, \w where|strong="G4226"\w* \w shall|strong="G5316"\w* the \w ungodly|strong="G0765"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w sinner|strong="G0268"\w* \w appear|strong="G5316"\w*?

\w Wherefore|strong="G5620"\w* let them that \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* commit the \w keeping|strong="G3908"\w* of \w their|strong="G1438"\w* \w souls|strong="G5590"\w* \add to him\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* well \w doing|strong="G0016"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* unto a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w Creator|strong="G2939"\w*.
